dmca.title: DMCA AND REGISTERED TRADEMARK INFRINGMENT
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: John Evans [mailto:jevans9@socal.rr.com] Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 2004 10:55 PM To: copyright@theplanet.com Cc: abuse@theplanet.com; legal@gameconsoleskins.com Subject: DMCA AND REGISTERED TRADEMARK INFRINGMENT Importance: High Date: 11/22/2004 From: John Evans To: ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. and all subsidiaries Subject: DMCA Claim and Registered Trademark infringement. Work(s) infringed: Violation of copyright, violation of US and Canadian Registered Trademarks TMA619436 and 78304398 respectively. Source code of site infringed site http://www.gameconsoleskins.com

Xbox Skins, Xbox Skin, Console Skins, Console Skin, PS2 Skins, PS2 Skin, Playstation 2 Skins, Playstation 2 skin, modchip, Xbox Skins, Xbox Skin, Console Skins, evox, Console Skin, PS2 Skins, PS2 Skin, Playstation 2, Xbox Skins, X box Skin, Console Skins, Console Skin, PS2 Skins, PS2 Skin, Playstation2 Skins, Playstation2 skin, modchip, evox Skins, Playstation 2 skin, modchip

Location(s) of materials claimed to infringe upon Copyright and Trademark(s): http://www.skinefx.com The following HTML code is IDENTICAL not only in word order but also in case, clearly copied directly from the original site (www.gameconsoleskins.com). Furthermore the term Console SkinR (Skin) is a Registered Trademark. There are countless other locations throughout this website that not only infringe on copyright but more seriously infringe on the Registered Trademarks, we consider these violations deliberate, flagrant and unlawful.

Xbox Skins, Xbox Skin, Console Skins, Console Skin, PS2 Skins, PS2 Skin, Playstation 2 Skins, Playstation 2 skin, modchip, Xbox Skins, Xbox Skin, Console Skins, evox, Console Skin, PS2 Skins, PS2 Skin, Playstation 2, Xbox Skins, X box Skin, Console Skins, Console Skin, PS2 Skins, PS2 Skin, Playstation2 Skins, Playstation2 skin, modchip, evox Skins, Playstation 2 skin, modchip

Date, time, time zone infringement observed: 11/18/2004 11:40AM PST; 11/21/2004 2:30PM PST, 11/23/04 8:00 PM PST Complaining party's name, address, phone, fax, Internet e-mail address: SkinsFoundry Inc. 6762 Warner Ave Ste P1 Huntington Beach, CA 92647 PH: 714-642-6582 legal@gameconsoleskins.com I believe this information is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner. The use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, the Trademark owner its agents or the law. We further demand that access to the stated materials be permanently removed or that access to such materials be disabled immediately to avoid further legal actions against the offending parties and or content providers. Respectfully, J. Evans E. Rubenstein Esq. Cc: Law Office 11 Cc: File
